items.text: Edit Scheduled Polls — Modify poll settings before they go live: question, options, channel, settings, close method, and schedule time. Fully pre-filled modal for seamless editing
Instant Poll Repost — One-click repost of closed polls as fresh copies with zero votes. Optional channel override to share polls across different channels
Schedule Poll Repost — Schedule recurring polls with datetime picker and close method options. Perfect for weekly check-ins and recurring surveys
Poll Management UI — Edit, Repost, and Schedule Repost buttons added to creator DMs and /askify list command for easy poll lifecycle management
Interactive Landing Page Demos — Replaced static screenshots with fully interactive components: clickable poll creation form, live voting demo, and animated results sharing
Consistent Container Widths — Unified all pages (landing, docs, changelog, header, footer) to 1400px max-width for a cohesive layout experience
